fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.misc

Class TestSupport<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.misc.TestSupport<T>

  • public class TestSupport<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to simplify test purpose.

    This class is used to facilitate the debug and test processes for the application. It contains method that create data to save into the database for this purpose. Data created can't be used to test application running.

    See Also:
    createCategoryList(), createPickupPlaceList(List), createImageList(List), createBidList(List, List), createUserList(), createItemList(List, List), enterFunction(), action(String), populateDatabase(DAOFactory), clearDatabase(DAOFactory), executeAndCompare(String, List, ResultList), daysAfter(Date, int), daysBefore(Date, int), searchItem(ManagerFactory, UserRole, String, String, Search), displayTable(List, List)

      • createPickupPlaceList

        public java.util.List<PickupPlace> createPickupPlaceList(@NotNull
                                                         @NotNull java.util.List<Item> items)
        Create a list of pickup places.

        Create a predefined list of pickup places used for debug purpose. Because a pickup place belongs to an item, a list of items need to be supplied in parameters.

        Parameters:
        items - List of items to use for creating pickup places.
        Returns:
        List of pickup places.

      • createImageList

        public java.util.List<Image> createImageList(@NotNull
                                             @NotNull java.util.List<Item> items)
        Create a list of images.

        Create a predefined list of images used for debug purpose. Because an image belongs to an item, a list of items need to be supplied in parameters.

        Parameters:
        items - List of items to use for creating images.
        Returns:
        List of images.

      • createBidList

        public java.util.List<Bid> createBidList(@NotNull
                                         @NotNull java.util.List<Item> items,
                                         @NotNull
                                         @NotNull java.util.List<User> users)
        Create a list of bids.

        Create a predefined list of bids used for debug purpose. Because a bid belongs to an item owned by someone and made by someone, a list of items and user need to be supplied in parameters.

        Parameters:
        items - List of items to use for creating bids.
        users - List of users to use for creating bids.
        Returns:
        List of bids.

      • createUserList

        public java.util.List<User> createUserList()
        Create a list of users.

        Create a predefined list of users used for debug purpose.

        Returns:
        List of users.

      • createItemList

        public java.util.List<Item> createItemList(java.util.List<User> users,
                                           java.util.List<Category> categories)
        Create a list of items.

        Create a predefined list of items used for debug purpose. Because an item should belong to a buyer and is contained in a category, this information need to be supplied in parameters.

        Parameters:
        users - List of users to use.
        categories - List of categories to use.
        Returns:
        List of items.

        public void action(@NotNull
                   @NotNull java.lang.String message)
        Display a text header containing the action that will be executed.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to display.

      • populateDatabase

        public void populateDatabase(DAOFactory daoFactory)
        Fill the database.

        This method fill the database with data. It will add categories, user, items, images, bids and pickup places. All data are in good associated. See clearDatabase() to clear the database.

        Parameters:
        daoFactory - DaoFactory used to access the database.
        See Also:
        clearDatabase()

      • clearDatabase

        public void clearDatabase(DAOFactory daoFactory)
        Clear the database.

        This method will remove all data in the database with the respect of all associations, which means images, bids and pickup places will be removed before items, and items before users and categories. See populateDatabase() to fill the database.

        Parameters:
        daoFactory - DaoFactory used to access the database.
        See Also:
        populateDatabase()

      • daysAfter

        public java.util.Date daysAfter(java.util.Date date,
                                int nbr)
        Compute a date that is days after.

        This method compute a date that is Nbr days after the supplied date. If this date is null, then the current date is used.

        Parameters:
        date - Date reference or null for the current
        nbr - Nbr of days
        Returns:
        Computed date.

      • daysBefore

        public java.util.Date daysBefore(java.util.Date date,
                                 int nbr)
        Compute a date that is days before.

        This method compute a date that is Nbr days before the supplied date. If this date is null, then the current date is used.

        Parameters:
        date - Date reference or null for the current
        nbr - Nbr of days
        Returns:
        Computed date.

      • searchItem

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> searchItem(ManagerFactory managerFactory,
                                                                       UserRole role,
                                                                       java.lang.String name,
                                                                       java.lang.String password,
                                                                       Search criteria)
        Search items related to a user.

        This method search items owen by u user according to criteria supplied in parameter. The result is a HashMap containing in the form of key/value pairs the result, one for the user found name "user", and the other for the items named "items".

        Parameters:
        managerFactory - Instance of the manager factory to use.
        role - User role (seller or buyer).
        name - User name.
        password - User password.
        criteria - Search criteria.
        Returns:
        Found user and items.

        Display a table of data
        Parameters:
        labels - Labels used in the header.
        lines - Content of the table body
